title: Sweden - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: 11,300 BDT (Embassy) + 1,035 BDT (VFS) + 4,000 BDT (Processing Fee) + Travel Insurance extra

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport (valid for at least 3 months beyond return, with 2 blank pages)
Completed and signed Schengen Visa Application Form 119031
Clear purpose of travel (tourism or visiting friends/family)
Personal bank statements of the past 6 months and proof of financial means
Confirmed hotel booking and round-trip flight itinerary
Proof of employment, business registration, or student enrollment
Health and travel insurance covering at least €30,000
Invitation letter and sponsor documents if visiting family/friends
Translated documents related to civil status (marriage, birth, divorce certificates if applicable)

details.title: Required Documents
items: Visa application form (Form 119031), filled and signed
One passport-size color photo (35mm x 45mm, white background)
Valid passport with at least 3 months validity beyond stay and previous passports
Photocopy of passport bio-page and previous visa pages
Flight reservation and detailed travel itinerary
Hotel booking with full address and contact information
Personal cover letter explaining purpose of visit and who will bear expenses
Health and travel insurance valid for Schengen area
Employment letter or business documents (translated if needed)
TIN certificate and income tax return
Bank statement (personal and company if self-employed) for last 6 months
Civil status documents (marriage, divorce, death, birth certificates as applicable)
Invitation letter and sponsor’s ID/residence documents (if visiting someone in Sweden)

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
